text: Mata akuma ga, kare-ra no okonai o rippadearu to omowa sete ko itta toki o omoe. `Kyo wa dare mo, anata gata ni uchikatsu koto wa dekinai. Hontoni watashi wa anata gata no hogo-shadearu.'Daga ryogun ga tagaini atta toki, kare wa kakato o kaeshite itta. `Watashi wa, hontoni anata gata to kankei wanai. Watashi ni wa anata gata ni mienai mono ga mieru. Watashi wa hontoni arra ga osoroshi noda. Arra wa shobatsu ni genjude ara reru
